titles.title: A bill to improve outcomes for Medicaid beneficiaries with major depressive disorder or other mental health conditions.
A bill to improve outcomes for Medicaid beneficiaries with major depressive disorder or other mental health conditions.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: This bill requires the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services to issue guidance for state Medicaid programs on best practices to support individuals with major depressive disorder or other mental health conditions, including options that include pharmacogenetic testing.
